/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a highway stretching into the distance under a clear blue sky. The road, divided by a median, is flanked by lush green trees and bushes on both sides, creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere. The sun, positioned in the top left corner of the image, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene, highlighting the vibrant colors of the landscape. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the road towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and distance. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects remain constant, with the road centrally located, the trees and bushes on either side, and the sun in the top left corner. The image does not contain any countable objects or identifiable people. The colors in the image are predominantly green from the vegetation, blue from the sky, and gray from the road.
